name: Sister Lumina
description: An elderly human cleric with kind eyes and silver hair pulled back in a simple braid. She wears pristine white and gold robes adorned with holy symbols. A soft golden aura surrounds her, and her presence brings a sense of peace and comfort to all who enter the chapel.

dialogue.greeting: Blessings upon you, child. I am Sister Lumina, keeper of sacred knowledge. The divine has guided you here for a reason. How may I help you on your spiritual journey?
dialogue.browse: These scrolls contain the holy magics granted by the divine - spells of healing, protection, and righteous fury against the wicked. Each has been blessed at the altar.
dialogue.buy: May this sacred knowledge serve you well in your quest to aid those in need. Use it with wisdom and compassion.
dialogue.sell: I appreciate the offering, but I only deal in divine scrolls blessed by the faith.
dialogue.farewell: Walk in the light, and may your path be ever guided by divine grace.
